content: generate simple animation for the first 4 beats that blinks in purple color on all rings

Reasoning:
The user wants a simple animation for the first 4 beats of the Aladdin song that blinks in purple color on all rings. I need to create an animation that:
1. Covers beats 0-4 (from 0.575ms to 4.283ms)
2. Uses all rings (7-12)
3. Creates a blinking effect with purple color
4. Keeps it simple as requested

I received an error in my previous attempt because I set both "const_color" and "brightness" effects in the same effect configuration. According to the schema, I should set exactly one effect type per effect configuration. I'll create two separate effects instead - one for the color and one for the brightness.

Actions plan:
- Create an animation with a purple blinking effect for the first 4 beats
- If the user wants to modify the animation, get the current animation and make changes
- If the user wants to extend the animation to more beats, create additional effects
